name: Ascend (itch) (Tommaso Faraci)
description:
Begin your ascent into heaven!

Use the platforms to bounce higher and higher but ... Watch out for the volatile platforms: some platforms will disappear after being hit!

Bounce across multiple platforms in a row to increase your score multiplier with massive combos and challenge your friends with the online leaderboard!
